name: Sparta Technologies Ltd
goal:
Sparta Digital provides IoT and data analytics, automation, community platforms and consultancy services. Our services as a core have heavy social and financial inclusion element.

We aim to provide open and transparent information services to all users and organisations.
interests: Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Software platforms, Privacy and digital inclusion, Internet of Things, Cloud computing,CMS
